mentions.candidate: Labour's candidate for Leeds North West has been caught out not once, but TWICE making false statements on leaflets.

quotes.text: Labour has apologised for including a false endorsement from a charity on a campaigning leaflet sent to homes across Leeds North West.
The campaign for Alex Sobel, who is contesting the Leeds North West seat for Labour, was forced to backtrack when it emerged that a supportive quote claimed to be from Kidz in Kampz was untrue.
Labour has apologised for including a false endorsement from a charity on a campaigning leaflet sent to homes across Leeds North West.
Labourâ€™s Leeds North West branch has had to send out 15,000 leaflets of apology for making a false claim about a rival election candidate.

images.caption: Is this the kind of person you want as your MP?
